attributes.name: calculate-widths
attributes.description: Enables calculation of column widths. `widths` property will be available in select scoped slots

attributes.name: caption
attributes.description: Set the caption (using `<caption>`)

attributes.name: checkbox-color
attributes.description: Set the color of the checkboxes (showSelect must be used)

attributes.name: custom-filter
attributes.description: Function to filter items

attributes.name: custom-group
attributes.description: Function used to group items

attributes.name: custom-sort
attributes.description: Function used to sort items

attributes.name: dark
attributes.description: Applies the dark theme variant to the component. You can find more information on the Material Design documentation for [dark themes](https://material.io/design/color/dark-theme.html).

attributes.name: dense
attributes.description: Decreases the height of rows

attributes.name: disable-filtering
attributes.description: Disables filtering completely

attributes.name: disable-pagination
attributes.description: Disables pagination completely

attributes.name: disable-sort
attributes.description: Disables sorting completely

attributes.name: expand-icon
attributes.description: Icon used for expand toggle button.

attributes.name: expanded
attributes.description: Array of expanded items. Can be used with `.sync` modifier

attributes.name: fixed-header
attributes.description: Fixed header to top of table. **NOTE:** Does not work in IE11

attributes.name: footer-props
attributes.description: See the [`v-data-footer`](/api/v-data-footer) API for more information

attributes.name: group-by
attributes.description: Changes which item property should be used for grouping items. Currently only supports a single grouping in the format: `group` or `['group']`. When using an array, only the first element is considered. Can be used with `.sync` modifier

attributes.name: group-desc
attributes.description: Changes which direction grouping is done. Can be used with `.sync` modifier

attributes.name: header-props
attributes.description: Pass props to the default header. See [`v-data-table-header` API](/api/v-data-table-header) for more information

attributes.name: headers
attributes.description: An array of objects that each describe a header column. See the example below for a definition of all properties

attributes.name: headers-length
attributes.description: Can be used in combination with `hide-default-header` to specify the number of columns in the table to allow expansion rows and loading bar to function properly

attributes.name: height
attributes.description: Set an explicit height of table

attributes.name: hide-default-footer
attributes.description: Hides default footer

attributes.name: hide-default-header
attributes.description: Hide the default headers

attributes.name: item-key
attributes.description: The property on each item that is used as a unique key

attributes.name: items
attributes.description: The array of items to display

attributes.name: items-per-page
attributes.description: Changes how many items per page should be visible. Can be used with `.sync` modifier. Setting this prop to `-1` will display all items on the page

attributes.name: light
attributes.description: Applies the light theme variant to the component.

attributes.name: loading
attributes.description: If `true` and no items are provided, then a loading text will be shown

attributes.name: loading-text
attributes.description: Text shown when `loading` is true and no items are provided

attributes.name: locale
attributes.description: Sets the locale used for sorting. This is passed into [`Intl.Collator()`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Intl/Collator/Collator) in the default `customSort` function

attributes.name: mobile-breakpoint
attributes.description: Used to set when to toggle between regular table and mobile view

attributes.name: multi-sort
attributes.description: If `true` then one can sort on multiple properties

attributes.name: must-sort
attributes.description: If `true` then one can not disable sorting, it will always switch between ascending and descending

attributes.name: no-data-text
attributes.description: Text shown when no items are provided to the component

attributes.name: no-results-text
attributes.description: Text shown when `search` prop is used and there are no results

attributes.name: page
attributes.description: The current displayed page number (1-indexed)

attributes.name: search
attributes.description: Text input used to filter items

attributes.name: server-items-length
attributes.description: Used only when data is provided by a server. Should be set to the total amount of items available on server so that pagination works correctly

attributes.name: show-expand
attributes.description: Shows the expand toggle in default rows

attributes.name: show-group-by
attributes.description: Shows the group by toggle in the header and enables grouped rows

attributes.name: show-select
attributes.description: Shows the select checkboxes in both the header and rows (if using default rows)

attributes.name: single-expand
attributes.description: Changes expansion mode to single expand

attributes.name: single-select
attributes.description: Changes selection mode to single select

attributes.name: sort-by
attributes.description: Changes which item property (or properties) should be used for sort order. Can be used with `.sync` modifier

attributes.name: sort-desc
attributes.description: Changes which direction sorting is done. Can be used with `.sync` modifier

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Used for controlling selected rows

events.name: click:row
events.description: Emits when a table row is clicked. This event provides 2 arguments: the first is the item data that was clicked and the second is the other related data provided by the `item` slot. **NOTE:** will not emit when table rows are defined through a slot such as `item` or `body`.

arguments.name: argument
arguments.type:
any, {
  expand: (value: boolean) => void,
  headers: DataTableHeader[],
  isExpanded: boolean,
  isMobile: boolean,
  isSelected: boolean,
  item: any,
  select: (value: boolean) => void
}

events.name: contextmenu:row
events.description: Emits when a table row is right-clicked. The item for the row is included. **NOTE:** will not emit when table rows are defined through a slot such as `item` or `body`.

arguments.name: argument
arguments.type:
MouseEvent, {
  expand: (value: boolean) => void,
  headers: DataTableHeader[],
  isExpanded: boolean,
  isMobile: boolean,
  isSelected: boolean,
  item: any,
  select: (value: boolean) => void
}

events.name: current-items
events.description: Emits the items provided via the **items** prop, every time the internal **computedItems** is changed.

events.name: dblclick:row
events.description: Emits when a table row is double-clicked. The item for the row is included. **NOTE:** will not emit when table rows are defined through a slot such as `item` or `body`.

arguments.name: argument
arguments.type:
MouseEvent, {
  expand: (value: boolean) => void,
  headers: DataTableHeader[],
  isExpanded: boolean,
  isMobile: boolean,
  isSelected: boolean,
  item: any,
  select: (value: boolean) => void
}

events.name: input
events.description: Array of selected items

events.name: item-expanded
events.description: Event emitted when an item is expanded or closed

events.name: item-selected
events.description: Event emitted when an item is selected or deselected

events.name: page-count
events.description: Emits when the **pageCount** property of the **pagination** prop is updated

events.name: pagination
events.description: Emits when something changed to the `pagination` which can be provided via the `pagination` prop

events.name: toggle-select-all
events.description: Emits when the `select-all` checkbox in table header is clicked. This checkbox is enabled by the **show-select** prop

events.name: update:expanded
events.description: The `.sync` event for `expanded` prop

events.name: update:group-by
events.description: Emits when the **group-by** property of the **options** property is updated

events.name: update:group-desc
events.description: Emits when the **group-desc** property of the **options** prop is updated

events.name: update:items-per-page
events.description: Emits when the **items-per-page** property of the **options** prop is updated

events.name: update:multi-sort
events.description: Emits when the **multi-sort** property of the **options** prop is updated

events.name: update:must-sort
events.description: Emits when the **must-sort** property of the **options** prop is updated

events.name: update:options
events.description: Emits when one of the **options** properties is updated

events.name: update:page
events.description: Emits when the **page** property of the **options** prop is updated

events.name: update:sort-by
events.description: Emits when the **sort-by** property of the **options** prop is updated

events.name: update:sort-desc
events.description: Emits when the **sort-desc** property of the **options** prop is updated

slots.name: body
slots.description: Slot to replace the default table `<tbody>`

slots.name: body.append
slots.description: Appends elements to the end of the default table `<tbody>`

slots.name: body.prepend
slots.description: Prepends elements to the start of the default table `<tbody>`

slots.name: expanded-item
slots.description: Slot to customize expanded rows

slots.name: foot
slots.description: Slot to add a `<tfoot>` element after the `<tbody>`. Not to be confused with the `footer` slot

slots.name: footer
slots.description: Slot to add a custom footer

slots.name: footer.page-text
slots.description: Slot to customize footer page text

slots.name: footer.prepend
slots.description: Adds content to the empty space in the footer

slots.name: group
slots.description: Slot to replace the default rendering of grouped rows

slots.name: group.header
slots.description: Slot to customize the default rendering of group headers

slots.name: group.summary
slots.description: Slot to customize the default rendering of group summaries

vue-properties.name: on
vue-properties.type: {"sort":"(value: string) => void","group":"(value: string) => void","toggle-select-all":"(value: boolean) => void"}

slots.name: header.<name>
slots.description: Slot to customize a specific header column

slots.name: header.data-table-select
slots.description: Slot to replace the default `v-simple-checkbox` in header

slots.name: item
slots.description: Slot to replace the default rendering of a row

slots.name: item.<name>
slots.description: Slot to customize a specific column

slots.name: item.data-table-expand
slots.description: Slot to replace the default `v-icon` used when expanding rows

slots.name: item.data-table-select
slots.description: Slot to replace the default `v-simple-checkbox` used when selecting rows

slots.name: loading
slots.description: Defines content for when `loading` is true and no items are provided

slots.name: no-data
slots.description: Defines content for when no items are provided

slots.name: no-results
slots.description: Defines content for when `search` is provided but no results are found

slots.name: progress
slots.description: Slot to replace the default `<v-progress-linear>` component

slots.name: top
slots.description: Slot to add content above the table
